spell_tooltip.description: Aspect of the Cheetah has 50% reduced cooldown and grants its effects to allies within 15 yds.
Feign Death reduces damage taken by 90% for 2 sec.

Misdirection now causes the next 3 hostile spells cast on your target within 10 sec to be redirected to your pet, but its cooldown is increased by 15 sec.

Your pet must be within 20 yards of the target for spells to be redirected.
Every 10 Focus you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Exhilaration by 1.0 sec.
Disengage also frees you from all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 50% for 4 sec.
You attempt to finish off a wounded target, dealing 634,214 Physical damage. Only usable on enemies with less than 20% health.
Maximum health increased by 8%, and Exhilaration now also heals you for an additional 12.0% of your maximum health over 8 sec.
Damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 5%.

Kill Command has a 10% chance to grant Deathblow.

 Deathblow
The cooldown of Kill Shot is reset. Your next Kill Shot can be used on any target, regardless of their current health.

Hurls a tar trap to the target location that creates a 8 yd radius pool of tar around itself for 30 sec when the first enemy approaches. All enemies have 50% reduced movement speed while in the area of effect. Limit 1. Trap will exist for 1 min.

Removes 1 Enrage and 1 Magic effect from an enemy target.

Successfully dispelling an effect generates 10 Focus.
Reduces all damage you and your pet take by 30% for 8 sec.
Interrupts spellcasting, preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Tranquilizing Shot removes up to 1 additional Magic effect from up to 2 nearby targets.
Misdirects all threat you cause to the targeted party or raid member, beginning with your next attack within 30 sec and lasting for 8 sec.
Survival of the Fittest gains an additional charge.

Reduce the cooldown of Survival of the Fittest by 30 sec, and increase its duration by 2.0 sec.

Reduce the cooldown of Counter Shot and Muzzle by 2 sec.
Wildfire Bomb deals 10% increased damage.
When Tranquilizing Shot successfully dispels an effect or Muzzle interrupts a cast, gain 10 Focus.
Commands your pet to intimidate the target, stunning it for 5 sec.
Fires an explosive shot at your target. After 3 sec, the shot will explode, dealing 549,461 Fire damage to all enemies within 8 yds. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

You and your pet have 5.0% increased attack speed.

This effect is increased by 100% if you do not have an active pet.
The damage of Explosive Shot is increased by 8%.
Critical strike chance increased by 4%.
Movement speed increased by 4%.
You and your pet blend into the surroundings and gain stealth for 1 min. While camouflaged, you will heal for 2% of maximum health every 1 sec.
Your movement speed is increased by 30% anytime you have not attacked for 3 sec.
You gain 5% more critical strike from critical strike sources.
Reduces the cooldowns of Aspect of the Eagle, Aspect of the Cheetah, and Aspect of the Turtle by 30 sec.

You take 20% reduced damage while Camouflage is active.

This effect persists for 3 sec after you leave Camouflage.
Feign Death and Aspect of the Turtle removes poison and disease effects from you.
Hurls a fire trap to the target location that explodes when an enemy approaches, causing 56,190 Fire damage and knocking all enemies up. Limit 1. Trap will exist for 1 min.

Your damage over time effects deal 10% increased damage.

This effect is increased by 50% on targets below 20% health.

Give the command to kill, causing your pet to savagely deal 139,350 Physical damage to the enemy.

Kill Command has a 20% chance to immediately reset its cooldown.

Generates 15 Focus.

Hurl a bomb at the target, exploding for 210,921 Fire damage in a cone and coating enemies in wildfire, scorching them for 215,875 Fire damage over 6 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Deals 80% increased damage to your primary target.
A vicious slash dealing 483,028 Physical damage.
Wildfire Bomb now has 2 charges, and the initial explosion deals 50% increased damage.
Kill Command increases the direct damage of your other spells by 15%, stacking up to 3 times.
Auto-attacks with a two-handed weapon reduce the cooldown of Wildfire Bombs by 1.0 sec.

A brutal attack that deals 459,862 Physical damage and grants you Mongoose Fury.

Mongoose Fury
Increases the damage of Mongoose Bite by 15% and the chance for Kill Command to reset by 2% for 16 sec, stacking up to 5 times.

Kill Command has an additional 10% chance to immediately reset its cooldown.

Tip of the Spear's damage bonus is increased up to 30%, based on your critical strike chance.

Mongoose Bite and Raptor Strike have a 10% chance to reset Kill Command's cooldown.

Kill Command reduces the cooldown of Wildfire Bomb by 0.5 sec.

Quick Shot and and auto-attacks with a two-handed weapon increase the direct damage of your next Wildfire Bomb by 4%, stacking up to 3 times.

Casting Coordinated Assault grants 3 stacks of Wildfire Arsenal.

Attack all nearby enemies in a flurry of strikes, inflicting 430,871 Physical damage to nearby enemies and 420,111 damage over 8 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Reduces the remaining cooldown on Wildfire Bomb by 3 sec for each target hit, up to 15.0 sec.

Each stack of Mongoose Fury increases the chance for Kill Command to reset by 2%.

Kill Command extends the duration of Mongoose Fury by 1.5 sec.
Kill Command now has 2 charges, and deals 15% increased damage.
Kill Shot, Serpent Sting, Arcane Shot, Steady Shot, and Explosive Shot deal 20% increased damage.

Wildfire Bomb deals 5% increased damage and has a 25% chance to reset the cooldown of Explosive Shot.

Explosive Shot reduces the cooldown of Wildfire Bomb by 2 sec.

Flanking Strike damage increased by 40% and Flanking Strike now increases your attack speed by 25% for 12 sec.

Butchery reduces the remaining cooldown on Wildfire Bomb by 3.0 sec for each target hit, up to 5 targets.

Enemies damaged by Flanking Strike bleed for an additional 840,222 damage over 8 sec.

Up to 5 enemies damaged by Butchery bleed for an additional 420,111 damage over 8 sec.

Raptor Strike and Mongoose Bite damage increased by 15%.

Raptor Strike and Mongoose Bite apply Serpent Sting to your target.

Serpent Sting
Fire a poison-tipped arrow at an enemy, dealing 47,455 Nature damage instantly and an additional 326,319 damage over 12 sec.

Kill Command causes the target to bleed for 44,748 damage over 8 sec.

You and your pet gain 10% attack speed for every bleeding enemy within 12 yds.
Damage of Flanking Strike and Butchery increased by 5% and all damage dealt by Wildfire Bomb increased by 5%.
Reapplying Serpent Sting to a target also spreads it to up to 4 enemies within 8 yds.
Wildfire Bomb and Explosive Shot damage increased by 10.0%.
Raptor Strike, Mongoose Bite, and Butchery damage increased by 10%.

Furiously strikes all enemies in front of you, dealing 2.5 million Physical damage over 2.5 sec. Critical strike chance increased by 50% against any target below 20% health. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

You and your pet charge your enemy, striking them for a combined 429,686 Physical damage. You and your pet's bond is then strengthened for 20 sec, causing you and your pet to deal 20% increased damage.

While Coordinated Assault is active, Kill Command's chance to reset its cooldown is increased by 15%.

Fury of the Eagle's damage is increased by 10% and has a 20% chance to generate a stack of Tip of the Spear.

When Fury of the Eagle ends, your Haste is increased by 8%.
The cooldown of Coordinated Assault is reduced by 60 sec and Coordinated Assault now grants 3 stacks of Tip of the Spear.

When you cast Coordinated Assault, you gain 1 charge of Wildfire Bomb. 

When Coordinated Assault ends, Explosive Shot's cooldown is reset and your next Explosive Shot fires at 2 additional targets at 100% effectiveness.

While in combat, every 20 sec your next Kill Command summons the aid of a Beast.

 Wyvern
A Wyvern descends from the skies, letting out a battle cry that increases the damage of you and your pets by 15% for 15 sec.

 Boar
A Boar charges through your target 3 times, dealing 533,471 physical damage to the primary target and 213,422 damage to up to 8 nearby enemies.

 Bear
A Bear leaps into the fray, rending the flesh of your enemies, dealing 1 million damage over 10 sec to up to 8 nearby enemies.

Howl of the Pack Leader causes your Kill Command to generate an additional stack of Tip of the Spear.

Summoning a Beast reduces the cooldown of Wildfire Bomb by 10.0 sec.

Kill Command reduces the cooldown of Howl of the Pack Leader by 2.0 sec.

Mongoose Bite reduces the cooldown of Howl of the Pack Leader by 1.0 sec.

Howl of the Pack Leader's cooldown is reduced to 25 sec.

Your pets gain an extra 5% of your attack power.
Initial damage from your Bear will consume Serpent Sting from up to 8 nearby targets, dealing 100% of its remaining damage instantly.

Your pet's attacks increase your Wyvern's damage bonus by 1%, up to 10%.

Casting Wildfire Bomb extends the duration of your Wyvern by 5.0 sec, up to 10 additional sec.

Summoning your Boar refreshes the duration of Mongoose Fury.

Each time your Boar deals damage, you have a 25% chance to gain a stack of Mongoose Fury and Mongoose Bite strikes 1 additional target. Stacks up to 4 times.

Mongoose Fury
Increases the damage of Mongoose Bite or Raptor Strike by 15% for 16 sec, stacking up to 5 times.

Damage from your Kill Shot sends your pets into a rage, causing all active pets within 20 yds and your Bear to pounce to the target and Smack, Claw, or Bite it.

Your pets will not leap if their target is already in melee range.

When dropping below 60% health, summon the aid of a Turtle, reducing the damage you take by 10% for 6 sec.

This effect can only occur once every 1.5 min.
When Disengage removes a movement impairing effect, its cooldown is reduced by 4 sec.
Casting Coordinated Assault grants Howl of the Pack Leader and increases the damage dealt by your Beasts by 25% and your pet by 25% for 12 sec.
Every 10 Focus you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Exhilaration by 1.0 sec.
Disengage also frees you from all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 50% for 4 sec.
You attempt to finish off a wounded target, dealing 636,599 Physical damage. Only usable on enemies with less than 20% health.
Maximum health increased by 8%, and Exhilaration now also heals you for an additional 12.0% of your maximum health over 8 sec.
Damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 5%.

Kill Command has a 10% chance to grant Deathblow.

 Deathblow

You gain 5% more critical strike from critical strike sources.
Reduces the cooldowns of Aspect of the Eagle, Aspect of the Cheetah, and Aspect of the Turtle by 30 sec.
Feign Death and Aspect of the Turtle removes poison and disease effects from you.
Hurls a fire trap to the target location that explodes when an enemy approaches, causing 56,173 Fire damage and knocking all enemies up. Limit 1. Trap will exist for 1 min.

Your damage over time effects deal 10% increased damage.

This effect is increased by 50% on targets below 20% health.
Give the command to kill, causing your pet to savagely deal 102,401 Physical damage to the enemy.

A quick shot causing 207,887 Physical damage.

Reduces the cooldown of Kill Command by 1 sec.
Your Call Pet additionally summons the pet from the bonus slot in your stable. This pet will obey your Kill Command, but cannot use pet family abilities.

Fire a shot that tears through your enemy, causing them to bleed for 475,072 damage over 12 sec.

Sends your pet into a frenzy, increasing attack speed by 30% for 12 sec, stacking up to 3 times.

Generates 20 Focus over 8 sec.
Passive Focus generation increased by 125%.
Barbed Shot increases your critical strike chance by 2% for 12 sec, stacking up to 3 times.
Kill Command deals increased critical strike damage equal to 100% of your critical strike chance.
Fires several missiles, hitting all nearby enemies within 8 yds of your current target for 100,547 Physical damage. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
When your pet attacks critically strike, they cause their target to bleed for 8% of the damage dealt over 6 sec.
Casting Cobra Shot reduces the cooldown of Barbed Shot by 2 sec.
Kill Command now has 2 charges, and deals 15% increased damage.
Your auto shot has a 15% chance to also fire a Cobra Shot at your target.
After you Multi-Shot, your pet's melee attacks also strike all nearby enemies for 80% of the damage for the next 6.0 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Your auto shot critical strikes have a 20% chance to reset the cooldown of Barbed Shot.

Direct damage from Barbed Shot has a 30% chance to explode on impact, applying Serpent Sting and dealing 160,589 Nature damage to nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 8 targets.

 Serpent Sting
Fire a shot that poisons your target, causing them to take 52,808 Nature damage instantly and an additional 321,123 Nature damage over 18 sec.
When you cast Barbed Shot, your pet stomps the ground, dealing 72,163 Physical damage to its primary target and 72,388 Physical damage to all other nearby enemies.

Casting Cobra Shot increases its damage by 25%. Stacks up to 4 times.

Upon reaching 4 stacks, the bonus is removed and you gain 8% increased pet damage for 8 sec.
While Beast Cleave is active, Kill Command now also strikes nearby enemies for 80% of damage dealt. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Summons a powerful wild beast that attacks the target and roars, increasing your Haste by 5% for 8 sec.

Generates 20 Focus.
Kill Command damage is increased by 10%. Barbed Shot lasts 2.0 sec longer.

Sends you and your pet into a rage, instantly dealing 139,374 Physical damage to its target, and increasing all damage you both deal by 30% for 15 sec. Removes all crowd control effects from your pet.
Kill Command has a 20% chance to also summon a Dire Beast to attack your target for 8 sec.

Every 3 casts of Dire Beast sounds the Horn of Valor, summoning either Hati or Fenryr to battle.

Hati
Increases the damage of all your pets by 8%.

Fenryr
Pounces your primary target, inflicting a heavy bleed that deals 338,446 damage over 8 sec and grants you 8% Haste.
When summoned, Dire Beasts gain Beast Cleave at 100% effectiveness for 8.0 sec.
Barbed Shot reduces the cooldown of Bestial Wrath by 12.0 sec.
Dire Beast lasts an additional 2 sec and deals 60% increased damage.
While Bestial Wrath is active, Cobra Shot resets the cooldown on Kill Command.
Activating Bestial Wrath grants 1 charge of Barbed Shot.
While Bestial Wrath is active, your pet's critical damage dealt is increased by 35%.

Howl of the Pack Leader causes your Kill Command to generate an additional stack of Tip of the Spear.

Summoning a Beast reduces the cooldown of Wildfire Bomb by 10.0 sec.

Kill Command reduces the cooldown of Howl of the Pack Leader by 2.0 sec.

Mongoose Bite reduces the cooldown of Howl of the Pack Leader by 1.0 sec.

Howl of the Pack Leader's cooldown is reduced to 25 sec.

Your pets gain an extra 5% of your attack power.
Your Bear's periodic damage has a 10% chance to reduce the cooldown of Butchery or Flanking Strike by 2.0 sec.

Your pet's attacks increase your Wyvern's damage bonus by 1%, up to 10%.

Casting Wildfire Bomb extends the duration of your Wyvern by 5.0 sec, up to 10 additional sec.

Summoning your Boar refreshes the duration of Mongoose Fury.

Each time your Boar deals damage, you have a 25% chance to gain a stack of Mongoose Fury and Mongoose Bite strikes 1 additional target. Stacks up to 4 times.

Mongoose Fury
Increases the damage of Mongoose Bite or Raptor Strike by 15% for 16 sec, stacking up to 5 times.

Damage from your Kill Shot sends your pets into a rage, causing all active pets within 20 yds and your Bear to pounce to the target and Smack, Claw, or Bite it.

Your pets will not leap if their target is already in melee range.

When dropping below 60% health, summon the aid of a Turtle, reducing the damage you take by 10% for 6 sec.

This effect can only occur once every 1.5 min.
When an enemy is stunned by Binding Shot, it is dragged to Binding Shot's center.
Casting Coordinated Assault grants Howl of the Pack Leader and increases the damage dealt by your Beasts by 25% and your pet by 25% for 12 sec.
Every 10 Focus you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Exhilaration by 1.0 sec.
Disengage also frees you from all movement impairing effects and increases your movement speed by 50% for 4 sec.
You attempt to finish off a wounded target, dealing 516,998 Physical damage. Only usable on enemies with less than 20% health.
Maximum health increased by 8%, and Exhilaration now also heals you for an additional 12.0% of your maximum health over 8 sec.
Damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 5%.

Natural Mending now reduces the cooldown of Exhilaration by an additional 0.5 sec

Mend Pet heals for an additional 25% of your pet's health over its duration, and has a 25% chance to dispel a magic effect each time it heals your pet.

Removes 1 Enrage and 1 Magic effect from an enemy target.

Successfully dispelling an effect generates 10 Focus.
Reduces all damage you and your pet take by 30% for 8 sec.
Interrupts spellcasting, preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Tranquilizing Shot removes up to 1 additional Magic effect from up to 2 nearby targets.
Survival of the Fittest gains an additional charge.

Reduce the cooldown of Survival of the Fittest by 30 sec, and increase its duration by 2.0 sec.

Reduce the cooldown of Counter Shot and Muzzle by 2 sec.
Wildfire Bomb deals 10% increased damage.
When Tranquilizing Shot successfully dispels an effect or Muzzle interrupts a cast, gain 10 Focus.
Commands your pet to intimidate the target, stunning it for 5 sec.
Fires an explosive shot at your target. After 3 sec, the shot will explode, dealing 556,383 Fire damage to all enemies within 8 yds. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
The cooldown of Intimidation is reduced by 10 sec.

You and your pet have 5.0% increased attack speed.

This effect is increased by 100% if you do not have an active pet.
Critical strike chance increased by 4%.
Movement speed increased by 4%.

Targets stunned by Binding Shot, knocked back by High Explosive Trap, knocked up by Implosive Trap, incapacitated by Scatter Shot, or stunned by Intimidation deal 10% less damage to you for 8 sec after the effect ends.
You and your pet blend into the surroundings and gain stealth for 1 min. While camouflaged, you will heal for 2% of maximum health every 1 sec.
Your movement speed is increased by 30% anytime you have not attacked for 3 sec.
You gain 5% more critical strike from critical strike sources.

When a trap triggers, you gain 30% movement speed for 3 sec.

Can only occur every 1 min.
Reduces the cooldowns of Aspect of the Eagle, Aspect of the Cheetah, and Aspect of the Turtle by 30 sec.

You take 20% reduced damage while Camouflage is active.

This effect persists for 3 sec after you leave Camouflage.
